column1: 5$"Condition: ""Change of Life"" Signs"$3/26/2019 3:50:11 PM$Reviewer: Jan
column2: 55-64 on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $5$1$5$I'm using Estradiol Transdermal System 0.05 mg/day once weekly patch produced by Sandoz A Novartis Division. The product has greatly improved my symptoms. HOWEVER
column3: it's almost impossible to keep the patch from coming off.  This happens sometimes the first day of application. More often it occurs in the shower. Before applying I clean the area with alcohol to be sure there is nothing to prevent the patch from sticking and I allow plenty of time for the area to dry prior to application. When one comes off I'm usually able to reuse the patch but this should not happen. The medicated side of the patch should not be exposed to anything other than my skin from the time it's applied until I remove it for a new application. My insurance will only approve a one month supply (4 patches) at one time which does not allow time to get replacements should I have to throw one away. I would love to know if the company is working to address this problem because I have seen other reviews listing this as an issue.

column1: 10$"Condition: ""Change of Life"" Signs"$9/7/2018 10:44:39 AM$Reviewer: 55-64 on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $5$5$5$Estradiol is a life saver for me. Im so thankful. Since using the patches
column2: i have slept better at night
column3: no more hot flashes! Thank you! I've had more energy
column4: probably because i get a good night sleep now
column5: before i was awaken all through the night with terrible hot flashes
column6: i suffered with them severely through out each day too. Not any more :) I haven had any weight gain or side effects from the patches. Havent had them fall off either. The main thing is do not put them where your panty line is on your waiste
column7: i apply mine in the center of my butt cheek
column8: i've never had a problem with them coming off at all.Wish i would have gotten on them a long time ago
column9: instead of letting myself suffer. Total life changer for me.

column5: heart attack. I do have all the menopausal symptoms. I have 1 remaining ovary. I'm also on a weight loss program. And as bad as it sounds I do not want to gain any weight. My question is: is taking this drug really nec or is it to only alleviate symptoms? I asked my nurse the same ? And she said yes it's nec esp foe osteoporosis..is that It? I'm 48 I don't want to die from the side effects before I even have a chance to get the osteoporosis. Can anyone help with this? Or less me to where I can get an answer as to what to do. Thank you so much (the ratings are not true just to post the ?)

column1: 19$Condition: Vaginal Inflammation due to Loss of Hormone Stimulation$6/11/2016 1:11:36 AM$Reviewer: Blondie
column2: 55-64 on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient) $1$1$1$I had to have a full hysterectomy due to tumors. Which put me into menopause. Was put on Estradiol Transdermal System twice a week. Used patches along with vaginal cream faithfully. So far this patch has not worked for me. Intercourse with my husband is very very painful. Was hoping reading these reviews would help me understand and not feel like I am the only women this is happening to. Sad to say it seems like the only problem these women have is a small rash and problems getting patch to stick. Not trying to make it seem like these problems don't matter. Was wanting and praying for answers. The reviews were more focused on the side effects rather than information on how it has helped these women. My Dr. never discussed with me how painful intercourse would be and that may be that way for the duration. Going on 4 years now. Just looking for answers and praying for a solution.

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient) $5$5$5$"Previously used Climara (clear patch) but switched to generic which costs me $28 less per month. In three years I've never had a problem getting it to stay on the whole week. Using name brand or generic I have to alternate patch from left and right abdomen due to slight itching whenever I place it on upper buttocks. It isn't clear but it works perfectly for me."
